Title: When I was 12 I read a copy of The Wealthy Barber that my dad had left around and that's probably re...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: When I was 12 I read a copy of The Wealthy Barber that my dad had left around and that's probably responsible for 80% of my attitude around investment. It's weird the little moments that seemed unimportant at the time but were pretty formative.
